## Background
Use a dataset with citrate and breed alone to be used in Problem 4 dealing with contrasts.


## Data
Read data from problem 2

```{r}
s_cit_dim_br_path <- here::here("docs", "data", "asm_exam_2024_p02.csv")
tbl_cit_dim_br <- readr::read_delim(s_cit_dim_br_path, delim = ",")
tbl_cit_dim_br
```

Remove DIM and save new data

```{r}
library(dplyr)
tbl_cit_br <- tbl_cit_dim_br %>%
  select(-DIM)
# write data to file
s_cit_br_path <- here::here("docs", "data", "asm_exam_2024_p04.csv")
if (!file.exists(s_cit_br_path)){
  readr::write_delim(tbl_cit_br, file = s_cit_br_path, delim = ",")
}
```
